org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.server

Interface ServerSideOperations

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataStoreOperations
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumuloOperations, BigTableOperations, HBaseOperations

    public interface ServerSideOperations
extends DataStoreOperations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addServerOp(String index, int priority, String name, String operationClass, Map<String,String> properties, com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> configuredScopes)
      add this server operation
      Map<String,String> getServerOpOptions(String index, String serverOpName, ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope scope)
      get the particular existing configured options for this server op at this scope
      String getVersion()
      Method to lookup the version of a remote datastore
      Map<String,com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope>> listServerOps(String index)
      Returns a mapping of existing registered server-side operations with serverop name as the key and the registered scopes as the value
      void removeServerOp(String index, String serverOpName, com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> scopes)
      remove this server operation - because accumulo requires scopes as a parameter it is passed into this method, but the server op will be removed entirely regardless of scopes
      void updateServerOp(String index, int priority, String name, String operationClass, Map<String,String> properties, com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> currentScopes, com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> newScopes)
      update this server operation, the current scopes are passed in because accumulo requires iteratorscope as a parameter to remove the iterator.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.operations.DataStoreOperations

        createDataIndexWriter, createDeleter, createMetadataDeleter, createMetadataReader, createMetadataWriter, createReader, createReader, createRowDeleter, createWriter, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, ensureAuthorizations, indexExists, mergeData, mergeStats, metadataExists

    • Method Detail

      • listServerOps

        Map<String,com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope>> listServerOps(String index)
        Returns a mapping of existing registered server-side operations with serverop name as the key and the registered scopes as the value
        Returns:
        the mapping

      • getServerOpOptions

        Map<String,String> getServerOpOptions(String index,
                                      String serverOpName,
                                      ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope scope)
        get the particular existing configured options for this server op at this scope
        Parameters:
        index - the index/table
        serverOpName - the operation name
        scope - the scope
        Returns:
        the options

      • removeServerOp

        void removeServerOp(String index,
                    String serverOpName,
                    com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> scopes)
        remove this server operation - because accumulo requires scopes as a parameter it is passed into this method, but the server op will be removed entirely regardless of scopes
        Parameters:
        index - the index/table
        serverOpName - the operation name
        scopes - the existing scopes

      • addServerOp

        void addServerOp(String index,
                 int priority,
                 String name,
                 String operationClass,
                 Map<String,String> properties,
                 com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> configuredScopes)
        add this server operation
        Parameters:
        index - the index/table
        priority - the operation priority (this is merely relative, it defines how to order multiple operations, from low to high)
        name - the operation name
        operationClass - the operation class
        properties - the operation options
        configuredScopes - the scopes

      • updateServerOp

        void updateServerOp(String index,
                    int priority,
                    String name,
                    String operationClass,
                    Map<String,String> properties,
                    com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> currentScopes,
                    com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> newScopes)
        update this server operation, the current scopes are passed in because accumulo requires iteratorscope as a parameter to remove the iterator. This will update the server op to the new scope.
        Parameters:
        index - the index/table
        priority - the operation priority (this is merely relative, it defines how to order multiple operations, from low to high)
        name - the operation name
        operationClass - the operation class
        properties - the operation options
        currentScopes - the existing scopes
        newScopes - the new configured scopes

      • getVersion

        String getVersion()
        Method to lookup the version of a remote datastore
